metadata.title: Awmnjtmgpw 925 Sterling Silver Vintage Elegant Blue Bicolor Flower Lily Ring Handmade Grain Size 6-10 (Size 9)
features: 100% brand new imported high quality materials
925 Sterling Silver provides an eternal experience of lead-free, nickel free and hypoallergenic
Elegant design, exquisite and clear, exudes a simple and simple atmosphere. No one will hide this excitement after receiving the gift.
It is the perfect gift for birthdays, anniversaries, mother's day, Christmas, weddings or other special occasions.
In case of any quality problem or dissatisfaction, a full refund will be made.
description: Best Gift: This ring is eye-catching and feminine! A lovely gift for the special lady in your life.Perfect for any gift giving occasion, suitable Valentines Day gift, Birthday gift, Anniversary gift, Mother's Day gift. Care: Gently clean by rinsing in warm water and drying with a soft cloth, and avoid chemicals, strong light, heat and ultrasonic cleaning.
